title: How to get rid of the demotion shield thing
body: If i win 2 games ill get about 25 LP but if i lose i lose around 24, so its really hard to carry... does anyone know what I have to do to get rid if this trash?

replies.body: The [**demotion shield**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204010760#h3q2) only prevents you from ranking up to a new tier only to lose a game and immediately drop back down (since that would feel preeeeetty bad). Demotion shields don't affect how much LP you gain or lose. FYI, those demotion shields last 3 games after advancing a division, and 10 games after going up a tier.
